name: Jake Lewis, Seasons, Big Bang, Revenge Racing, Tower of Hanoi Colour
name_original: Jake Lewis, Seasons, Big Bang, Revenge Racing, Tower of Hanoi Colour
description:
Seasons: This prototype is an animation made in Processing with slight intractability. the prerequisites for this game was "The changing of seasons".

Big Bang: This prototype is a game that was created with one input, and space as the prerequisites. You spawn in space just before the big bang goes off. You must destroy 15 stars to win the game. If you can not reach any more stars, another big bang will go off with slower stars.

Revenge Racing: This prototype is a game that was created with revenge, racing, and locked screen as the prerequisites. You drive a car and must complete the race without hitting any other cars. The moment you hit a car, they will give up on the race and begin trying to smash into you. 

Tower of Hanoi Colours: This prototype is a phone app that can detect cards to place colours on top of them and then merge those colours by touching the cards together. Once you reach the colour you want, you can use the save card to save the desired colour.
